name: Bhagya Industries
overview:
Established in the year 2002, we, Bhagya Industries, are an eminent organization offering a wide and exclusive range of Staple Wire, Toothbrush and PVC Plunger to our esteemed customers. The offered products in this range are Toothbrush Anchor Wire, Staple Wire, Wire Forming Products, S.S. & G.I. Scrubber.

Team / Manpower; Production managers Quality controllers R&D experts Warehousing experts Sales and marketing personnel

Infrastructure: We have a sound and sophisticated infrastructure which extends over a vast area. This infrastructural unit has been segregated into various departments like designing, production, quality control, R&D and other units in order to accelerate the process of production.

Warehouse / Production Capacity: To meet small and bulk orders within the stipulated time frame, we have a spacious warehouse. Our huge warehouse is well furnished with essential facilities that provide favorable environment to the products.

Quality Assurance: Being a quality-centric organization, we have been engaged in offering a quality-assured range of products to our esteemed customers. The offered products are manufactured using the best-in-class raw material procured from authentic vendors of the market. Moreover, in order to match upto the clients expectations, our professionals fabricate these products using the latest technology and advanced machinery.

Client Satisfaction: Ever since the time of inception, our main aim has been to serve our clients with world-class products manufactured at our end using the finest technology and supreme quality raw material, procured from some of the reliable sources of the industry.
